$:/plugins/kookma/hsl/history.title: $:/plugins/kookma/hsl/history
$:/plugins/kookma/hsl/history.text:
Full change log  https://kookma.github.io/TW-hsl/#ChangeLog

* ''1.2.2'' -- 2025.07.23 -- updated to TW 5.3.8
* ''1.2.0'' -- 2023.02.04 -- major release, updated to TW 5.2.5
* ''1.0.1'' -- 2020.05.07 -- bugfix in the sidebar UI and typos in documentation
* ''1.0.0'' -- 2020.05.06 -- bugfix in styles and sidebar UI
* ''0.9.0'' -- 2020.05.01 -- documentation improved, minor bug fixed
* ''0.8.0'' -- 2020.04.30 -- major improvement and shipping several color palettes
* ''0.5.0'' -- 2021.04.27 -- first public release
* ''0.1.0'' -- 2021.01.08 -- prototyping and first implementation

$:/plugins/kookma/hsl/macros/hslines.title: $:/plugins/kookma/hsl/macros/hslines
$:/plugins/kookma/hsl/macros/hslines.text:
\define hslines(src, begin, end, hlrange, language, offset:0) \import $:/plugins/kookma/hsl/macros/utility <$wikify name="numbers" text=<> > <$let length={{{ [[$end$]subtract[$begin$]add[1]] }}} source={{{[<__src__>get[text]else<__src__>]}}} > <$macrocall $name="hsl-copy-to-clipboard-above-right" src={{{ [splitregexp[\r?\n|\r]first<__end__>last] :and[join[ ]] }}} /> <$set name="hlrange" filter="[splitregexp[\r?\n|\r]addsuffix[ ]first[$end$]last]">
    <$list filter="[range[$begin$,$end$,1]]" variable=num> <$list filter="[enlistnsort[]matchthen[code-selected]else[code-notselected]]" variable="selected-class"> <$let pos={{{ [subtract[$begin$]add[1]] }}} >
  1. >><$codeblock code={{{ [enlist:rawnth] :else[[ ]] }}} language=<<__language__>>/>
\end hslines

$:/plugins/kookma/hsl/macros/utility.title: $:/plugins/kookma/hsl/macros/utility
$:/plugins/kookma/hsl/macros/utility.text:
\define lines2list() {{{[range[$(start)$,$(stop)$]addsuffix[ ]]}}} \define rawlist() <$list filter="[<__hlrange__>split[,]split[ ]!is[blank]]" variable=num> <$list filter="[search:title[-]]" emptyMessage=<> variable=vlines> <$let start= {{{ [split[-]first[]] }}} stop= {{{ [split[-]last[]] }}} > <> \end rawlist \define hsl-copy-to-clipboard(src,class:"tc-btn-invisible",style) \whitespace trim <$button class=<<__class__>> style=<<__style__>> message="tm-copy-to-clipboard" param=<<__src__>> tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/CopyToClipboard/Hint}}> {{$:/core/images/copy-clipboard}} \end \define hsl-copy-to-clipboard-above-right(src,class:"tc-btn-invisible",style) \whitespace trim
<$macrocall $name="hsl-copy-to-clipboard" src=<<__src__>> class=<<__class__>> style=<<__style__>>/>
\end

$:/plugins/kookma/hsl/readme.title: $:/plugins/kookma/hsl/readme
$:/plugins/kookma/hsl/readme.text:
; Highlight Selected Lines (HSL)
This tools is used to highlight selected lines or a range of lines to be standout.

;Code and demo
For learning plugin features, syntax, tutorial and examples see the plugin demo and code pages

* Demo: https://kookma.github.io/TW-hsl/
* Code: https://github.com/kookma/TW-hsl

$:/plugins/kookma/hsl/styles/codelist.cs.title: $:/plugins/kookma/hsl/styles/codelist.css

$:/plugins/kookma/hsl/styles/copy-to-cli.title: $:/plugins/kookma/hsl/styles/copy-to-clipboard.css

$:/plugins/kookma/hsl/styles/linenumbers.title: $:/plugins/kookma/hsl/styles/linenumbers.css

$:/plugins/kookma/hsl/styles/searchbox.c.title: $:/plugins/kookma/hsl/styles/searchbox.css

$:/plugins/kookma/hsl/styles/skin.css.title: $:/plugins/kookma/hsl/styles/skin.css

$:/plugins/kookma/hsl/ui/ControlPanel/se.title: $:/plugins/kookma/hsl/ui/ControlPanel/setting-select-hljtheme
$:/plugins/kookma/hsl/ui/ControlPanel/se.text:
\define checked() <$list filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]prefix[$:/plugins/kookma/hsl/highlightjs/themes/]] [[$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/highlight/highlight.css]] [[$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/highlight/styles]] -[[$(currentTiddler)$]]"> <$action-listops $tags="-$:/tags/Stylesheet"/> \end ''Set Highlight.js Theme'' Search in theme:  <$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/hsl/hlj-select-theme" tag=input default="" class="hsl-search-box"/> <$list filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]prefix[$:/plugins/kookma/hsl/highlightjs/themes/]sort[]]+[search:title{$:/temp/hsl/hlj-select-theme}]"> <$checkbox tag="$:/tags/Stylesheet" checkactions=<> > <$link/>
--- The basic themes from Tiddlywiki official plugins
<$list filter="[[$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/highlight/highlight.css]] [[$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/highlight/styles]] +[search:title{$:/temp/hsl/hlj-select-theme}]"> <$checkbox tag="$:/tags/Stylesheet" checkactions=<> > <$link/>

$:/plugins/kookma/hsl/ui/ControlPanel/se.title: $:/plugins/kookma/hsl/ui/ControlPanel/setting-show-all-linenumbers
$:/plugins/kookma/hsl/ui/ControlPanel/se.text:
\define chkactions() <$action-listops $tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/hsl/styles/linenumbers.css"  $tags="+$:/tags/Stylesheet"/>


<$vars status={{{[[$:/config/Hsl/Gutter]get[text]match[hide]then[yes]else[no]]}}}>

; Line numbers
:<$checkbox disabled=<<status>> tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/hsl/styles/show-all-line-numbers.css" tag="$:/tags/Stylesheet" checkactions=<<chkactions>>> Show line numbers for all lines
</$checkbox>
</$vars>

$:/plugins/kookma/hsl/ui/ControlPanel/se.title: $:/plugins/kookma/hsl/ui/ControlPanel/setting-switch-gutter
$:/plugins/kookma/hsl/ui/ControlPanel/se.text:
\define styleTids()
[[$:/plugins/kookma/hsl/styles/show-all-line-numbers.css]]
[[$:/plugins/kookma/hsl/styles/linenumbers.css]]
[[$:/plugins/kookma/hsl/styles/skin.css]]
\end
\define hide()
<$list filter="[enlist<styleTids>]">
<$action-listops $tiddler=<<currentTiddler>>  $tags="-$:/tags/Stylesheet"/>
</$list>>
\end
\define show()
<$list filter="[enlist<styleTids>]">
<$action-listops $tiddler=<<currentTiddler>>  $tags="+$:/tags/Stylesheet"/>
</$list>>
\end

;Switch Gutter 
:<$checkbox tiddler="$:/config/Hsl/Gutter" field="text" checked=hide unchecked=show checkactions=<<hide>>  uncheckactions=<<show>> > Turn off gutter, line numbers and line emphasizing</$checkbox>

$:/plugins/kookma/hsl/ui/ControlPanel/Se.title: $:/plugins/kookma/hsl/ui/ControlPanel/Settings
$:/plugins/kookma/hsl/ui/ControlPanel/Se.caption: Hsl
$:/plugins/kookma/hsl/ui/ControlPanel/Se.text:
These settings let you customise the behaviour of Highlight Selected Lines (hsl) plugin.

---

;Show Highlight Selected Lines (hsl) setting in more sidebar
:<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/hsl/ui/ControlPanel/Settings" tag="$:/tags/MoreSideBar"> Show setting in more sidebar</$checkbox>

<!-- line numbers mode -->
{{$:/plugins/kookma/hsl/ui/ControlPanel/setting-show-all-linenumbers}}

<!-- line numbers mode -->
{{$:/plugins/kookma/hsl/ui/ControlPanel/setting-switch-gutter}}

<!-- HighlightJs mode -->
<$list filter="[[$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/highlight]!is[missing]] :filter[lookup:no[$:/config/Plugins/Disabled/]match[no]]" variable=null>

{{$:/plugins/kookma/hsl/ui/ControlPanel/setting-select-hljtheme}}
</$list>
